para1: The Big Wave Riders is BVA's competitive junior boys volleyball program, developing Bermuda's next generation of champions through structured training and competitive play for athletes ages 12–18.
para2: Training is held 2–3 times per week, with a focus on technical fundamentals, athletic development, and competitive volleyball IQ. Our coaches identify the most talented athletes for national team consideration.
para3: The Big Wave Riders program is built on the belief that world-class volleyball can be developed right here in Bermuda — and that starts with investing in our juniors.
